DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Face Paint - Pearl Pastel Pink (2 ml)
DescriptionData.Description: Ruby Red Pearl Pastel Pink face paints are semi-solid cake face paints with strong pigmentation. They are water activated, apply fast and dry within 20 to 30 seconds. Ruby Red is made in USA and is FDA approved for USA, Canada, EU & Mexico. Ruby Red also comes with a child toy safety rating.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Provides pearlized effects to your face paint designs
Hypo-allergenic, non-toxic and vegan (free of any animal related product)
Free of paraben, fragrance, latex, nuts & gluten
0.14 oz/2 ml is enough to paint 10 full faces or approx. 100 cheek art designs (2" x 2" size).
FDA approved and made in USA
